message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about $11500?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $11000?
I can see you're a persistent negotiator, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $11250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $11000 again?
